title: Sesame Quinoa Salad
directions: Prepare the quinoa according to package directions. While quinoa cooks, add pineapple tidbits to a saute pan over medium heat. Cook 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Turn heat to medium-high and add snap peas and green onions to pan. Add 2 tablespoons water and cover with lid to steam, about 2 minutes. When water has evaporated, remove pan from heat.
In a large bowl, add all ingredients, tossing gently to combine. Season to taste with salt & pepper, and add more dressing if desired. Serve warm, or chill for 1 hour and serve.
ingredients: 1 bag TJ's Organic Sprouted Tricolor Quinoa
1/2 bag TJ's Sugar Snap Peas, sliced
1/4 - 1/2 cup TJ's Fat Free Sesame Vinaigrette
